So you're saying that when people quit their jobs at a higher rate that's actually a good sign economically
The point of the macro economy it's a great sign when a lot of people are quitting because it suggests that they know that they have better options elsewhere they're leaving for a better job or they're confident that there'll be able to find a better job when they do quit
